name: Haunt Them All
description:
Play for the poltergeist seeking for revenge and stop robbers from stealing your treasures! Horror-movies haunted manshion simulation. CONTROLS: WASD + E + SPACE

Created in 72 hrs by LAVAteam for BCG jam.

Authors: Vladislav Shianov, Vasiliy Klimashin, Elena Klimashina, Alexey Evstigneev, Andrew Grigoriev
